    #include <stdio.h>
     
    inline int readInt(){
    int number = 0;
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0')
    c = getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0' && c<='9'){
    number = (number<<3)+(number<<1)+c-'0';
    c = getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return number;
    }
     
    int main(){
    int t,n,ans;
     
    t = readInt();
     
    while(t--){
    n = readInt();
    if(n%2 == 0 || n%3 == 0)
    printf("YES\n");
    else
    printf("NO\n");
    }
     
    return 0;
    }
